DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to gain further insights into the molecular pathogenesis of Fuchs' endothelial corneal dystrophy (FECD), to identify targets for potential specific drug therapy.
DOC.brief_title: The Molecular Pathogenesis of Late-onset Fuchs' Endothelial Corneal Dystrophy
DOC.criteria: FECD normal corneas (including enucleations for uveal melanoma) nonFECD oedematous corneas prior irradiation therapy for uveal melanoma corneal extension of uveal melanoma
